column5: Took a drive up to Goderich & Port Albert today. Not much coming in yet according to the fisherfolk I asked. A few catches out at the mouths but not upstream.  As one old feller put it - "Weather's too good. They like it nasty."  And good it was. 26 degrees in the sun, girls laying out in the sun, kids swimming at the beach, teeshirts & shorts were the order of the day.  JF
You lost me John. Whats coming?????????Winter
I think he's looking for the salmon run but lucked out with gals in bikinis instead Brian !
Fished the Notty again today, should have brought a towel and shorts instead of my rod and waders  Bring on the crappy weather!!!
My wife was with me. She hits me when I drool over bikini clad beachbunnies. Normally I just duck and cover, but it's our anniversary.  JF
